values: The Glory of God for Doubting Minds and Dull HeartsThe Glory of God for Doubting Minds and Dull Hearts

When we see the glory of God in his word, we know for sure and we rejoice forever. Glory persuades and pleases, gives certainty and satisfaction.When we see the glory of God in his word, we know for sure and we rejoice forever. Glory persuades and pleases, gives certainty and satisfaction.
